doc.field: - Benihana National Corp said it signed a letter of intent with [Tishman Realty and Construction Co Inc] to build a teppanyaki-style restaurant at the Hilton Hotel at Walt Disney World Village in Lake Buena Vista, Fal. Benihana National said it currently owns and operates 16 teppanyaki-style restaurants under license from its parent, [Benihana of Tokyo Inc].
